name: TipTop Technologies
tag_list: social-media, semantic-analysis, twitter-search, real-time-search, natural-language-results, comparison-shopping, sentiment-trends
description: searching experiences from life to life.
overview:
TipTop is a platform for semantic analysis of natural language which looks at data as a source of tips that help people solve problems.

The TipTop search engine finds many useful tips in conversational data, and we feel that a tool for exploring such information can complement the tools currently available for searching the Web. * Real time natural language search results capturing opinion, emotions, and experiences. * Exploration of search results filtered by advanced query operators, concept clouds, contextualized categories, and people. * Sharing discoveries across social networks. * Personal and public profile expressions through updates to, from and about users. * Discovering search trends and editorially generated queries to try.
